name: part_007
file: tmp_【#ノエルのリリカルLIVE 】新たな団長を見てッ !【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [8DQWjvFBma4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Song performance of 'YONA YONA DANCE' (ending part).
MC section. Noel reveals her new 1 million subscriber outfit and interacts with guests.

subtitles.original: 腑抜けた心にI need you 噂のアルカロイド
subtitles.english: To my spineless heart, I need you, the rumored alkaloid

subtitles.original: あだ名はネットのしゃれこうべ かき鳴らせギトショウ
subtitles.english: My nickname is 'The Internet's Skull', strum it, Gito-Show

subtitles.original: 付け焼き刃の侍が 乱れ打つ三段重
subtitles.english: The samurai with a borrowed blade strikes in a chaotic three-tiered sequence

subtitles.original: 悲劇の歴史で踊ろうか ほらヘンテコヘンテコ前々！
subtitles.english: Shall we dance through this tragic history? Look, it's weird, weird, forward, forward!

subtitles.original: はあ！
subtitles.english: Hah!

subtitles.original: 僕の心はエゴロック 斜め45度ナンセンス
subtitles.english: My heart is an Ego Rock, a 45-degree angle of nonsense

subtitles.original: ノウハウ砕いてマンネリを 明日にバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Crushing the know-how, breaking the rut, say bye-bye-bye to tomorrow

subtitles.original: 媚びへつらうその姿 吐き気の空模様
subtitles.english: That fawning appearance of yours is enough to make me sick

subtitles.original: シニカルな視線の雨
subtitles.english: A rain of cynical gazes

subtitles.original: 今日も両目を塞ぐふり
subtitles.english: Pretending to cover both eyes again today

subtitles.original: おちゃらけ頭にI need you 巷のアルカロイド
subtitles.english: To my goofy head, I need you, the alkaloid of the streets

subtitles.original: あの子も流行りのインスタンス 撒き散らせPRID
subtitles.english: That girl too, a trendy instance, spread around the PRID

subtitles.original: うなずき上がらぬ侍が 乱れ立つ愛闘座
subtitles.english: The samurai who won't stop nodding, rising in a chaotic battle of love

subtitles.original: 無残な歴史で歌おうよ ほらちゃんちゃらちゃんちゃら前々！
subtitles.english: Let's sing through this cruel history, look, it's a joke, a joke, forward, forward!

subtitles.original: はあ！
subtitles.english: Hah!

subtitles.original: ロックな心で生きようか 真っ当なパトスのミュージック
subtitles.english: Shall we live with a rock 'n' roll heart? The music of honest pathos

subtitles.original: ハウツー砕いて丸書いて 明日もワッハッハ
subtitles.english: Crushing the how-tos, drawing a circle, laughing 'Wah-ha-ha' tomorrow too

subtitles.original: 洒落臭さも癖になる
subtitles.english: Even that affectation becomes a habit

subtitles.original: はみ出し者だろう
subtitles.english: Must be an outcast

subtitles.original: リリカルな視線の雨
subtitles.english: A rain of lyrical gazes

subtitles.original: 今日も両目を開くふり
subtitles.english: Pretending to open both eyes again today

subtitles.original: 透明な感情は 染まるだけさ
subtitles.english: Transparent emotions are just waiting to be dyed

subtitles.original: だったら見て見ぬふりする奴らを 押し流せ
subtitles.english: In that case, let's brush aside those who turn a blind eye

subtitles.original: 人生かけても負けそうです 勝ち負け取り繕うナンセンス
subtitles.english: I feel like I'd lose even if I bet my life, this nonsense of patching up wins and losses

subtitles.original: 1分砕いて常識を 未来にセーグッバイ
subtitles.english: Crushing common sense in a minute, say goodbye to the future

subtitles.original: 僕の心はエゴロック 斜め45度ナンセンス
subtitles.english: My heart is an Ego Rock, a 45-degree angle of nonsense

subtitles.original: ノウハウ砕いてマンネリを 明日にバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Crushing the know-how, breaking the rut, say bye-bye-bye to tomorrow

subtitles.original: 媚びへつらうその姿 吐き気の空模様
subtitles.english: That fawning appearance of yours is enough to make me sick

subtitles.original: シニカルな視線の雨
subtitles.english: A rain of cynical gazes

subtitles.original: 今日も両目を塞ぐふり ワン・ツー・スリー・フォー・ツー
subtitles.english: Pretending to cover both eyes again today, one, two, three, four, two

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: みんな！これ、見えとる？見えとる？
subtitles.english: Everyone! Can you see this? Can you see?

subtitles.original: あ、みんなのすげー驚いてる顔が団長見えとるよ！
subtitles.english: Ah, I can see everyone's incredibly surprised faces!

subtitles.original: あーい、団長でーす！おーい！
subtitles.english: Alright, it's me! Hello!

subtitles.original: ということで、ちょっと団長なんか変わったところ気づきましたか？
subtitles.english: So, did you notice anything different about me?

subtitles.original: まあ、気づいてない人はいないと思います。
subtitles.english: Well, I don't think there's anyone who hasn't noticed.

subtitles.original: 団長なんと、なんと！
subtitles.english: To my surprise, to my surprise!

subtitles.original: 今回ね、あの前々から運営さんにお願いしていた
subtitles.english: This time, something I've been asking the management for a long time...

subtitles.original: 100万人記念の新衣装が出来上がりましたー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: My new outfit for the 1 million subscriber anniversary is ready! Yay!

subtitles.original: 今回はね、なんとそのお披露目も兼ねたライブになっていまして。
subtitles.english: This live stream is also serving as its big reveal.

subtitles.original: いや、びっくりしたっしょ？
subtitles.english: Were you surprised?

subtitles.original: いやね、めちゃめちゃ動きやすくなったんすよね。
subtitles.english: It's become so much easier to move in.

subtitles.original: いや、これ早くホロメンにも見てほしいなあ。
subtitles.english: Man, I want the other Hololive members to see this soon.

subtitles.original: 誰かいいねえかなあ。
subtitles.english: I wonder if anyone's around.

subtitles.original: うぇーい！お姉ちゃん可愛い！団長ー！お姉ちゃんめっちゃ可愛い！
subtitles.english: Whoo! You're cute, Sis! Master! You're so cute, Sis!

subtitles.original: あれ？なんか聞こえる。
subtitles.english: Huh? I hear something.

subtitles.original: お姉ちゃん可愛い！
subtitles.english: You're cute, Sis!

subtitles.original: え、なんかこれ、おっさん？あれ？あ！
subtitles.english: Wait, is that... some old guy? Huh? Ah!

subtitles.original: 唐突な前振りがあったな、今。
subtitles.english: That was a pretty sudden setup just now.

subtitles.original: 怪しいおっさんかと思ったけど、あ、この声は。
subtitles.english: I thought it was some shady old guy, but ah, this voice is...

subtitles.original: えーと、じゃあ、ちょっとやかましいの「や」からよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Um, okay then, let's start with the 'A' for 'Annoying'.

subtitles.original: 求めてるよー！行け行けー！
subtitles.english: I'm asking for it! Go go!

subtitles.original: やかましいの「や」誰や！
subtitles.english: Who's the annoying 'A'?!

subtitles.original: あれ？ころねじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Wait, isn't that Korone?

subtitles.original: やかましいの「や」、あ、ころねです。
subtitles.english: The annoying 'A', ah, it's Akone.

subtitles.original: あ, ころねー！
subtitles.english: Ah, Korone!

subtitles.original: わーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: こっちは誰や？
subtitles.english: And who's this one?

subtitles.original: ラミィじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it Lamy?

subtitles.original: ラミィです！
subtitles.english: It's Lamy!

subtitles.original: あ, ラミィ！
subtitles.english: Ah, Lamy!

subtitles.original: やかましいの「ま」、マリンです！
subtitles.english: The annoying 'M', it's Marine!

subtitles.original: あ、マリン！わかりやすいね、「ま」のマリン。
subtitles.english: Ah, Marine! That's easy to understand, 'M' for Marine.
